assessment_item.title: AIPR7X Q8.Which of the following errors is an error of omission?
assessment_item.body:
{"data":{"plugin":{"id":"org.ekstep.questionunit.mcq","version":"1.1","templateId":"horizontalMCQ"},"data":{"question":{"text":"

Which of the following errors is an error of omission?

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":""},"options":[{"text":"

Sale of Rs. 1,000 was recorded in the purchase journal

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1094"},{"text":"

Salary paid to Mohan and Vikas have been debited to their personal accounts

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","hint":"","isCorrect":false,"$$hashKey":"object:1095"},{"text":"

The total of sales journal has not been posted to the sales account

","image":"","audio":"","audioName":"","isCorrect":true,"$$hashKey":"object:1105"},{"text":"

Repairs to building have been debited to building account.
